original_text: When the woman saw that the fruit of the tree was good for food and pleasing to the eye, and also desirable for gaining wisdom, she took some and ate it. She also gave some to her husband, who was with her, and he ate it.
korean_text: 여자가 그 나무를 본즉 먹음직도 하고 보암직도 하고 지혜롭게 할 만큼 탐스럽기도 한 나무인지라 여자가 그 열매를 따먹고 자기와 함께 있는 남편에게도 주매 그도 먹은지라

sentences.original_text: that the fruit of the tree was good for food
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나무의 열매가 먹기에 좋다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and also desirable for gaining wisdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 지혜를 얻기에 바람직한 것을

sentences.original_text: she took some and ate it
She also gave some to her husband
